description: Contains product/inventory item information including pricing, suppliers, and stock details.

columns.name: StockItemID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each stock item.

columns.name: StockItemName
columns.description: Full name/description of the stock item.

columns.name: SupplierID
columns.description: Foreign key to Purchasing.Suppliers for the item's supplier.

columns.name: ColorID
columns.description: Foreign key to Warehouse.Colors if the item has a specific color.

columns.name: UnitPackageID
columns.description: Foreign key to Warehouse.PackageTypes for selling unit packaging.

columns.name: OuterPackageID
columns.description: Foreign key to Warehouse.PackageTypes for outer/bulk packaging.

columns.name: Brand
columns.description: Brand name of the item.

columns.name: Size
columns.description: Size description of the item.

columns.name: LeadTimeDays
columns.description: Number of days lead time for ordering from supplier.

columns.name: QuantityPerOuter
columns.description: Number of units per outer package.

columns.name: IsChillerStock
columns.description: Indicates if item requires refrigerated storage.

columns.name: Barcode
columns.description: Barcode for the item.

columns.name: TaxRate
columns.description: Default tax rate for this item.

columns.name: UnitPrice
columns.description: Current selling price per unit.

columns.name: RecommendedRetailPrice
columns.description: Manufacturer's suggested retail price.

columns.name: TypicalWeightPerUnit
columns.description: Typical weight per unit in kilograms.

columns.name: MarketingComments
columns.description: Marketing description and comments.

columns.name: InternalComments
columns.description: Internal notes about the item.

columns.name: Photo
columns.description: Product photo image.

columns.name: CustomFields
columns.description: JSON field for additional custom attributes.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Searchable tags for the item.

columns.name: SearchDetails
columns.description: Computed column for full-text search.

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
